verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}'Tis my happiness below Not to live without the cross But the Savior's pow'r to know Sanctifying ev'ry loss{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Trials must and will befall But with humble faith to see Love inscribed upon them all This is happiness to me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Did I meet no trials here No chastisement by the way Might I not with reason fear I should prove a castaway{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Trials make the promise sweet Trials give new life to prayer Bring me to my Savior's feet Lay me low and keep me there{/lang-eng}
